name: metrics
description: Help improve Atom by sending usage statistics, exceptions and deprecations to the team

dev.title: Development Settings
dev.description: Please refresh the Atom window after modifying any setting in this section.

verboseMode.title: Verbose mode
verboseMode.description: When set to `true`, any performed request containing metrics will be logged in console.

sendMetricsInDevMode.title: Send metrics in Dev mode
sendMetricsInDevMode.description: By default, Atom does not log anything in Dev mode. Set this param to `true` to log events in dev mode.

reportingFrequency.title: Reporting frequency
reportingFrequency.description: How often does Atom send metrics to GitHub (in minutes). By default it's once a day.
